protocol.name: P-G7636-1
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water.  Seeds were stratified at 4ËšC for 2 days before being planted on standard media.  Standard media is 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 0.5g/L MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH.  Salt media is standard media with varying amounts of NaCl added.  Nylon mesh was placed on top of the solidified media and seeds were evenly placed on the mesh at a density of ~20 seeds/cm in two rows.

protocol.name: P-G7636-2
protocol.text: Samples were prepared as in Birnbaum et al. (2005) except that roots were transferred to 140 mM NaCl for 1hr before protoplasting or harvested without protoplasting.  Protoplasted cells were passed through the FACS device with all cells being collected.

protocol.name: P-G7636-3
protocol.text: Fragmented cRNA probes were prepared using the two-cycle amplification protocol by Affymetrix.

protocol.name: P-G7636-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using the RNAeasy Micro Kit (Qiagen GmbH).
